marklogic.body: how do you know what downriverdem means? Â i agree 100% that it is a teen spouting Off.Â i did not present this as a judgement; i presented it as information.Â if you're afraid of information then you have an agenda and i will have no part of dealing with agendas.Â the truth should come out; not some narrative which supports your preconceived idea of what you need the story to be.Â i believe zimmerman executed trayvon martin in Cold blood as i have stated on this site for days.Â that does not mean i ignore facts which don't support that belief.Â if you want only facts that support your beliefs then you're no better than republicans.
